title: If you ever get bored on a rainy day or while you're sitting in class...
body:
watch this:

https://www.twitch.tv/saltyteemo

You can bet on what team you think will win, and youll get "money" if you win. It uses salty bet.
There is no name and shame, no sub 30 games for making fun of newbies is kinda a low blow.

These are mostly low elo matches.


Have fun GD
